GSP33rams11pu:1: tad ayuktam; tad dhi na vākyapratipādyam /
GSP33rams11pu:4: śastraṃ yasya yoniḥ kāraṇaṃ, pramāṇam, tac chāstrayoniḥ; tasya bhāvaś śāstrayonitvam; tasmāt
GSP33rams11pu:6: atyantātīndriyatvena pratyakṣādipramāṇāviṣayatayā brahmaṇaś śāstraikapramāṇakatvād uktasvarūpaṃ brahma yato vā imāni bhūtānītyādivākyaṃ bodhayaty evetyarthaḥ //
GSP33rams11pu:7: nanu śāstrayonitvaṃ brahmaṇo na saṃbhavati, pramāṇāntaravedyatvād
GSP33rams11pu:9: kiṃ tarhi tatra pramāṇam? na tāvatpratyakṣam /
GSP33rams11pu:10: tad dhi dvividham indriyasaṃbhavaṃ yogasaṃbhavaṃ ceti /
GSP33rams11pu:11: indriyasaṃbhavaṃ ca bāhyasaṃbhavam āntarasaṃbhavaṃ ceti dvividhā /
GSP33rams11pu:16: pūrvānubhūtaviṣayasmṛtimātratvān na prāmāṇyam iti kutaḥ pratyakṣatā ?
GSP33rams11pu:17: tadatiriktaviṣayatve kāraṇābhāvāt; tathā sati tasya bhramarūpavatā /
GSP33rams11pu:27: kim idam ekacetanādhīnatvam ? na tāvat tadāyattotpattisthititvam;
GSP33rams11pu:32: kiṃ ca, śarīrāvayavinaḥ svāvayavasamavetatārūpā sthitir avayavasaṃśleṣavyatirekeṇa na cetanam
GSP33rams11pu:34: prāṇanalakṣaṇā tu sthitiḥ pakṣatvābhimate kṣitijaladhimahīdharādau na saṃbhavatīti pakṣasapakṣānugatām ekarūpāṃ sthitiṃ nopalabhāmahe /
GSP33rams11pu:38: kiṃ ca, ubhayavādisiddhānāṃ jīvānām eva lāghavena kartṛtvābhyupagamo yuktaḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:39: na ca jīvānām upādānādyanabhijñatayā kartṛtvāsaṃbhavaḥ; sarveṣām eva cetanānāṃ pṛthivyādyupādānayāgādyupakaraṇasākṣātkārasāmarthyāt;
GSP33rams11pu:40: yathedānīṃ pṛthivyādayo yāgādayaś ca pratyakṣam īkṣyante /
GSP33rams11pu:43: bhaktimatsākṣātkāra eva hi kāryārambhopayogī; śaktes tu jñānamātram
GSP33rams11pu:45: na hi kulālādayaḥ kāryopakaraṇabhūtadaṇḍacakrādivat tacchaktim api sākṣātkṛtya ghaṭamaṇikādikāryam ārabhante /
GSP33rams11pu:46: iha tu cetanānām āgamāvagatayāgādiśaktiviśeṣāṇāṃ kāryārambho nānupapannaḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:47: kiṃ ca, yacchakyakriyaṃ śakyopādānādivijñānaṃ ca tad eva tadabhijñakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33rams11pu:48: mahīmahīdharamahārṇavādi tv aśakyakriyam aśakyopādānādivijñānaṃ ceti na cetanakartṛkam /
GSP33rams11pu:49: ato ghaṭamaṇikādi sajātīyaśakyakriyaśakyopādānādivijñānavastugatam eva kāryatvaṃ buddhimankartṛpūrvakatvasādhane prabhavati /
GSP33rams11pu:51: parigrahavatānāptakāmena nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭam iti tathāvidham eva cetanaṃ kartāraṃ sādhayann ayaṃ kāryatvahetus siṣādhayiṣitapuruṣasārvajñyasarvāiśvaryādiviparītasādhanād viruddhas syāt
GSP33rams11pu:53: liṅgini pramāṇāntaragocare liṅgabalopasthāpitā viparītaviśeṣās tatpramāṇapratihatagatayo nivartante
GSP33rams11pu:54: iha tu sakaletarapramāṇāviṣaye liṅgini nikhilanirmāṇacature anvayavyatirekāvagatāvinābhāvaniyamā dharmās sarva evāviśeṣeṇa
GSP33rams11pu:56: ata āgamād ṛte katham īśvaras setsyati ?
GSP33rams11pu:58: sāvayavatvād eva jagataḥ kāryatvaṃ na pratyākhyātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33rams11pu:59: bhavanti ca prayogāḥ vivādādhyāsitaṃ bhūbhūdharādi kāryam, sāvayavatvāt,
GSP33rams11pu:63: tanubhuvanādi kāryam, mahattve sati mūrtatvāt, ghaṭavat iti /
GSP33rams11pu:64: sāvayaveṣu dravyeṣu idam eva kriyate netarad iti kāryatvasya niyāmakaṃ sāvayavatvātireki rūpāntaraṃ nopalabhāmahe /
GSP33rams11pu:65: kāryatvapratiniyataṃ śakyakriyatvaṃ śakyopādānādivijñānatvaṃ copalabhyata iti cen na; kāryatvenānumate 'pi viṣaye jñānaśaktī kāryānumeye ity anyatrāpi sāvayavatvādinā kāryatvaṃ jñātam iti te ca pratipanne eveti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:67: vicitrasanniveśaṃ narendrabhavanam ālokya avayavasanniveṣaviśeṣeṇa tasya kāryatvaṃ niścitya tadānīm eva kartus tajjñānaśaktivaicitryam anuminoti /
GSP33rams11pu:68: atas tanubhuvanādeḥ kāryatve siddhe sarvasākṣātkāratannirmāṇādinipuṇaḥ kvacit puruṣaviśeṣas sidhyaty eva /
GSP33rams11pu:69: kiṃ ca sarvacetanānāṃ dharmādharmanimitte 'pi sukhaduḥkhopabhoge cetanānadhiṣṭhitayos tayor acetanayoḥ phalahetutvānupapattes sarvakarmānuguṇasarvaphalapradānacaturaḥ kaścid āstheyaḥ;
GSP33rams11pu:71: bījāṅkuarādeḥ pakṣāntarbhāvena tair vyabhicārāpādanaṃ śrotriyavetālānām anabhijñatāvijṛmbhitam
GSP33rams11pu:72: tata eva sukhādibhir vyabhicāravacanam api tathaiva /
GSP33rams11pu:73: na ca lāghavenobhayavādisaṃpratipannakṣetrajñānām eva īdṛśādhiṣṭhātṛtvakalpanaṃ yuktam; teṣāṃ sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭadarśanaśaktiniścayāt /
GSP33rams11pu:82: kenacit kiṃcit kriyamāṇaṃ svotpattaye kartus svanirmāṇasāmarthyaṃ svopādānopakaraṇajñānaṃ cāpekṣate; na tv anyāsāmarthyam anyajñānaṃ ca,
GSP33rams11pu:84: svanirmāṇasāmarthyasvopādānopakaraṇajñānābhyām eva svotpattāv upapannāyāṃ saṃbandhitayā darśanamātreṇākiṃcitkarasyārthāntarājñānādeḥ hetutvakalpanāyogād iti /
GSP33rams11pu:85: na tāvat sarvaviṣayam; na hi kulālādiḥ kriyamāṇavyatiriktaṃ kim api na jānāti /
GSP33rams11pu:88: ataḥ kāryatvasyāsādhakānām anīśvaratvādīnāṃ liṅginy apratītir iti na viparītasādhanatvam /
GSP33rams11pu:89: kulālādīnāṃ daṇḍacakrādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śarīradvāreṇaiva dṛṣṭam iti jagadupādānopakaraṇādhiṣṭhānam īśvarasyāśarīrasyānupapannam iti cen na;
GSP33rams11pu:91: katham aśarīrasya parapravartanarūpas saṃkalpa iti cet; na śarīrāpekṣas saṃkalpaḥ, śarīrasya saṃkalpahetutvābhāvāt /
GSP33rams11pu:95: mānasas saṃkalpas saśarīrasyaiva, saśarīrasyaiva samanaskatvād iti cen na; manaso nityatvena dehāpagame 'pi manasas sadbhāvenānaikāntyāt /
GSP33rams11pu:96: ato vicitrāvayavasanniveśaviśeṣatanubhuvanādikāryanirmāṇe puṇyapāpaparavaśaḥ parimitaśaktijñānaḥ kṣetrajño na prabhavatīti nikhilabhuvananirmāṇacaturo 'cintyāparimitajñānaśaktyaiśvaryo 'śarīraḥ
GSP33rams11pu:98: ataḥ pramāṇāntarāvaseyatvād brahmaṇo naitadvākyaṃ brahma pratipādayati /
GSP33rams11pu:99: kiṃ ca, atyantabhinnayor eva mṛddravyakulālayor nimittopādānatvadarśanena ākāśāder niravayavadravyasya kāryatvānupapattyā ca naikam eva brahma kṛtsnasya jagato nimittam upādānaṃ ca pratipādayituṃ śaknotīti //
GSP33rams11pu:100: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma janmādivākyaṃ bodhayaty eva /
GSP33rams11pu:102: yad uktaṃ sāvayavatvādinā kāryaṃ sarvaṃ jagat, kāryaṃ ca taducitakartṛviśeṣapūrvakaṃ dṛṣṭam iti nikhilajagannirmāṇatadupādānopakaraṇavedanacaturaḥ kaścid anumeya iti; tad
GSP33rams11pu:103: ayuktam; mahīmahārṇavādīnāṃ kāryatve 'pi ekadaivaikenaiva nirmitā ity atra pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33rams11pu:104: na caikasya ghaṭasyeva sarveṣām ekaṃ kāryatvam,
GSP33rams11pu:107: na ca kṣetrajñānāṃ vicitrajagannirmāṇaśaktyā kāryatvabalena tadatiriktakalpanāyām anekakalpanānupapatteś ca ekaḥ kartā bhavitum
GSP33rams11pu:112: na ca yugapat sarvotpattis sarvocchittiś ca pramāṇapadavīm adhirohataḥ; adarśanāt,
GSP33rams11pu:114: kāryatvena sarvotpattivināśayoḥ kalpyamānayoḥ darśanānuguṇyena kalpanāyāṃ virodhābhāvāc ca
GSP33rams11pu:119: sārvajñyasarvaśaktiyuktasya kasyacid ekasya sādhakam idaṃ kāryatvaṃ kiṃ yugamadutpadyamānasarvavastugatam ? uta krameṇotpadyamānasarvavāstugatam ? yugapadutpadyamānasarvavastugatatve kāryatvasyāsiddhatā krameṇotpadyamānasarvavastugatatve anekakarṭrkatvasādhanād viruddhatā /
GSP33rams11pu:120: atrāpy ekakarṭrkatvasādhane pratyakṣānumānavirodhaś śāstravirodhaś ca; kumbhakāro jāyate, rathakāro jāyata ityādiśravaṇāt /
GSP33rams11pu:121: api ca sarveṣāṃ kāryāṇāṃ śarīrādīnāṃ ca sattvādiguṇakāryarūpasukhādyanvayadarśanena sattvādimūlatvam avaśyāśrayaṇīyam /
GSP33rams11pu:124: tadyuktapuruṣāntaḥkaraṇavikāradvāreṇa, puruṣasya ca tadyogaḥ karmamūlaḥ iti kāryaviśeṣārambhāyaiva jñānaśaktivat kartuḥ karmasaṃbandhaḥ
GSP33rams11pu:126: / icchāyāḥ kāryārambhahetutve 'pi viṣayaviśeṣaviśeṣitāyās tasyās sattvāimūlakatvena karmasaṃbandho 'varjanīyaḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:128: kartāraḥ, na tadvilakṣaṇaḥ kaścid anumānāt sidhyati /
GSP33rams11pu:129: bhavanti ca prayogāḥ tanubhuvanādi kṣetrajñakartṛkam, kāryatvāt, ghaṭavat /
GSP33rams11pu:135: vyabhicāraḥ, tatrāpy anādes sūkṣmaśarīrasta sadbhāvāt/ vimativiṣayaḥ kālo na lokaśūnyaḥ, kālatvāt, vartamānakālavad iti /
GSP33rams11pu:136: api ca, kim īśvaras saśarīro 'śarīro vā kāryaṃ karoti ? na tāvad aśarīraḥ;
GSP33rams11pu:139: bhavanti; manaso nityatve 'pi aśarīreṣu mukteṣu tatkāryādarśanāt /
GSP33rams11pu:141: saśarīraḥ; vikalpāsahatvāt taccharīraṃ kiṃ nityam utānityam ? na tāvan nityam; sāvayavasya tasya nityatve jagato 'pi nityatvāvirodhād īśvarāsiddheḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:144: svayam eva hetur iti cen na; aśarīrasya tadayogāt; anyena śarīreṇa saśarīra iti cen na; anavasthānāt
GSP33rams11pu:145: sa kiṃ savyāpāro nirvyāpāro vā ? aśarīratvād eva na savyāpāraḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:147: kāryaṃ jagad icchāmātravyāpārakartṛkam ity ucyamāne pakṣasyāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvam,
GSP33rams11pu:149: ato darśanānuguṇyeneśvarānumānaṃ darśanānuguṇyaparāhatam iti śāstraikapramāṇakaḥ parabrahmabhūtas sarveśvaraḥ puruṣottamaḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:152: yat tu nimittopādānayor aikyam ākāśāder niravayavadravyasya kāryatvaṃ cānupalabdham aśakyapratipādanam ity uktam, tad apy aviruddham iti prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt, na viyadaśruter ity atra pratipādayiṣyate /
GSP33rams11pu:153: ataḥ pramāṇāntarāgocaratvena śāstraikaviṣayatvād yato vā imāni bhūtānīti vākyam uktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma pratipādayatīti siddham
